00060 #include <stdio.h>
00061 #include "mscb.h"
00062 
00063 extern bit DEBUG_MODE;
00064 
00065 char code node_name[] = "SCS-600-P1";
00066 
00067 
00068 sbit SR_CLOCK = P0 ^ 2;         // Shift register clock
00069 sbit SR_STROBE = P0 ^ 5;        // Storage register clock
00070 sbit SR_DATAO = P0 ^ 6;         // Serial data out
00071 sbit SR_DATAI = P0 ^ 7;         // Serial data in
00072 sbit SR_OE = P0 ^ 3;            // Output enable
00073 sbit SR_READB = P0 ^ 4;         // Serial data readback
00074 
00075 /*---- Define variable parameters returned to CMD_GET_INFO command ---*/
00076 
00077 /* data buffer (mirrored in EEPROM) */
00078 
00079 struct {
00080    unsigned char out[8];
00081    unsigned char in;
00082    float power[8];
00083 } idata user_data;
00084 
00085 MSCB_INFO_VAR code variables[] = {
00086    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out0", &user_data.out[0],
00087    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out1", &user_data.out[1],
00088    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out2", &user_data.out[2],
00089    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out3", &user_data.out[3],
00090    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out4", &user_data.out[4],
00091    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out5", &user_data.out[5],
00092    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out6", &user_data.out[6],
00093    1, UNIT_BOOLEAN, 0, 0, 0, "Out7", &user_data.out[7],
00094    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power0", &user_data.power[0],
00095    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power1", &user_data.power[1],
00096    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power2", &user_data.power[2],
00097    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power3", &user_data.power[3],
00098    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power4", &user_data.power[4],
00099    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power5", &user_data.power[5],
00100    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power6", &user_data.power[6],
00101    4, UNIT_PERCENT, 0, 0, MSCBF_FLOAT, "Power7", &user_data.power[7],
00102    0
00103 };

00105 unsigned char output;

00107 /********************************************************************\

00113 #pragma NOAREGS
00114 
00115 void user_write(unsigned char channel) reentrant;
00116 
00117 /*---- User init function ------------------------------------------*/
00118 
00119 void user_init(unsigned char init)
00120 {
00121    unsigned char i;
00122 
00123    PRT1CF = 0xFF;               // push-pull for P1
00124    /* initialize configuration data */
00125 
00126    if (init) {
00127       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++) {
00128          user_data.out[i] = 0;
00129          user_data.power[i] = 100;
00130       }
00131    }
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 /*---- User write function -----------------------------------------*/
00136 
00137 void user_write(unsigned char index) reentrant
00138 {
00139    if (index);
00140 }
00141 
00142 /*---- User read function ------------------------------------------*/
00143 
00144 unsigned char user_read(unsigned char index)
00145 {
00146    if (index);
00147    return 0;
00148 }
00149 
00150 /*---- User function called vid CMD_USER command -------------------*/
00151 
00152 unsigned char user_func(unsigned char *data_in, unsigned char *data_out)
00153 {
00154    /* echo input data */
00155    data_out[0] = data_in[0];
00156    data_out[1] = data_in[1];
00157    return 2;
00158 }
00159 
00160 /*---- Apply power settings as a fraction of a second --------------*/
00161 
00162 unsigned char cycle;
00163 unsigned char ca[8];
00164 
00165 #define BIT(i) (0x80 >> i)      // "reverse" order
00166 //#define BIT(i) (1 << i)      // normal order
00167 
00168 void set_power(void)
00169 {
00170    unsigned char i;
00171    static unsigned long on_time;
00172    float frac;
00173    unsigned long expired;
00174 
00175    /* turn output off after on-time expired */
00176    for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00177       if (user_data.power[i] < 100) {
00178          expired = time() - on_time;
00179          if (expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i])) {
00180             frac = user_data.power[i] - (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]);
00181 
00182             if (frac == 0 || expired >= (unsigned long) (user_data.power[i]) + 1) {
00183                output &= ~BIT(i);
00184             } else if (cycle > 0) {
00185                if ((float) ca[i] / cycle > frac) {
00186                   output &= ~BIT(i);
00187                } else {
00188                   ca[i]++;
00189                }
00190             } else {
00191                ca[i]++;
00192             }
00193          }
00194       }
00195 
00196    /* turn all outputs on every second */
00197    if (time() - on_time >= 100) {
00198       on_time = time();
00199       for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00200          if (user_data.power[i] > 0 && user_data.out[i])
00201             output |= BIT(i);
00202 
00203       cycle = (cycle + 1) % 10;
00204 
00205       if (cycle == 0)
00206          for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00207             ca[i] = 0;
00208    }
00209 
00210    /* set outputs according to main switch */
00211    for (i = 0; i < 8; i++)
00212       if (user_data.power[i] >= 100) {
00213          if (user_data.out[i])
00214             output |= BIT(i);
00215          else
00216             output &= ~BIT(i);
00217       }
00218 
00219    /* write output to P1 */
00220    P1 = output;
00221 }
00222 
00223 /*---- User loop function ------------------------------------------*/
00224 
00225 void user_loop(void)
00226 {
00227    /* set output according to power */
00228    set_power();
00229 }
